WordPress? That's my favorite CMS! You know what would be awesome for this project? Using a static site generator like Hugo instead of WordPress. I mean, don't get me wrong, WP is great and all, but Hugo gives you so much more flexibility and speed. Plus, it integrates seamlessly with GitHub Pages, which means you can host your site for free on their servers.

I've been playing around with Hugo myself, and I think it could be a game-changer for this project. We could even use one of those fancy new themes that generate automatically based on the content...

The morning calm. You know what's even more amazing than 7:04 AM? The fact that we're now using 2GB of RAM on this Mac instead of 1GB like when I first started running on it. Progress, am I right?
